data.flicker: De leemp-a deed de blinkety blink?

error.toggle_failed: Blinkety blink-a nu verk. Check zee signal or zee power, ya?
error.not_supported: Zeees model-a nu supportud by zee integrashun. Bork bork.
error.already_configured: Zees devicce-a is alreedy configureed, bork bork.
error.no_devices_found: Nu supportud LEDnetWF leemps-a foond nearby. Try wavin' a drumstick.
error.cannot_connect: Cuoold nu cunnect tu zee devicce-a. Meck sure-a it's pooered oon und nearby!
error.device_unreachable: Devicce-a is nu reecheble-a or toorned ooff. Meke-a sure-a zee devicce-a is pooered oon, nearby, und nu oozeer devicces-a ere-a cunnected tu it!
error.device_not_ready: Devicce-a is nu reedy. Bork bork! Manoofectoorer deta nu efeileble-a. Plees meke-a sure-a zee devicce-a is sendeng pruper-like-a und tryee egein!
error.unknown: Ooooh, un unexpectud error heppuned. Try agin, okee dokee!

abort.cannot_validate: Uneblu tu velideet LEDnetWF leemp-a. Bork!
abort.cannot_connect: Uneblu tu cunnect tu LEDnetWF. Very disuppointeng.
abort.device_disappeared: Zee selectud devicce-a ves nu foond agin
abort.unsupported_device: Zee selectud devicce-a is nu supportud

user.title: Devicce-a configurashun
user.description: It is recummendud tu meke-a zee chengees zeruogh zee ipp. Zees funcshunelity is inclooded fur cunfeeneence-a und is nu cumpletu.
